--- Created by DELL.
--- Dat-eTime: 2020/12/17 11:17
---
---

print("NormalTip")
local cs_coroutine = require 'cs_coroutine'
local isShowing = false
local tip = CS.UnityEngine.GameObject.Find("Tip")
local tipText = tip:GetComponentInChildren(typeof(CS.UnityEngine.UI.Text))
local coroutine = function()
    isShowing = true
    tip:SetActive(true)
    coroutine.yield(CS.UnityEngine.WaitForSeconds(2))
    tip:SetActive(false)
    isShowing = false
end
tip:SetActive(false)
function showTip(message)
    if not isShowing then
        print('showTip:' .. message)
        tipText.text = message
        cs_coroutine.start(coroutine)
    else
        print("isHaveOtherShowing")
    end
end

return {
    showTip = showTip;
}
